title.narrative: AJOAGO - Comic Relief RND Cyclone Kennet

description.narrative: Since 2001, AJOAGO with support of main partners is involved in successfully preparedness and response, improving water, sanitationand hygiene services, food security and other programmes in rural communities of Mozambique. Thus far services have been installed in main districts of 5 different provinces of the country. This project targets at least 3.000 households in Guara Guara resettlement neighbourhoods in Buzi District. Through the project these people will achieve tangible improvements in their health status, welfare and dignity through increased and sustainable access to improved water and hygiene facilities delivery and by applying associatedhygiene practices to prevent COVID 19 Pandemic.
